DOC.brief_summary: To investigate whether or not the ingestion of caffeine with alter airway responsiveness to methacholine and/or change the level of exhaled nitric oxide.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Caffeine on Methacholine Challenge and Exhaled Nitric Oxide Levels.
DOC.criteria: clinical diagnosis of asthma FEV1 greater than 65% asthma is poorly controlled presence of other airway disease (e.g. COPD)
